## Description

build a POST request with data encoded as
`appplication/x-www-form-urlencoded`

## Usage

```r
post_form_request(
  url,
  data,
  insecure = get_crane_opt("curl", "insecure", default = FALSE)
)
```

## Arguments

* `url`: request url
* `data`: named character of request data
* `insecure`: skip peer verification
